p: We also compared the PD and SCZ GWAS results to sets of blood- and brain-specific eQTLs derived from GTEx. We demonstrated an enrichment of SCZ heritability in brain-specific eQTLs and blood-specific eQTLs, but no enrichment of PD heritability in either eQTL annotation (Fig. 3a, Supplementary Table 2). A comparison of eQTLs specific to each brain region revealed no preferential enrichment of disease heritability in one region relative to the others (Fig. 3b, Supplementary Table 2). In summary, these analyses revealed no enrichment of PD heritability in brain annotations, while in contrast, SCZ heritability was highly enriched in both global and specific regional brain annotations.
